hero.title: Bridge the Gap Between Campus and Career
hero.subtitle: AI is automating the work that once trained the next generation. Campus2Career connects ambitious students with corporate project teams ‚Äî giving talent real experience and giving companies a low-risk pipeline to the best minds on any campus.

items.title: For Students:
items.description: Go beyond the classroom. Build a portfolio of real corporate projects that proves you can do the work AI can't.

items.title: For Companies:
items.description: Access motivated, pre-vetted talent for scoped projects ‚Äî no headcount commitment, no intern program overhead, just results.

items.title: For Universities:
items.description: Boost graduate placement rates and career readiness without building new infrastructure. Plug your students into real opportunities.

items.title: Post Your Project
items.description: Describe your project needs and requirements. Our team will help match you with the right talent.

items.title: Review Applications
items.description: Browse qualified candidates, review portfolios, and select the perfect match for your project.

items.title: Collaborate & Succeed
items.description: Work together through our secure platform with built-in tools for communication and delivery.

testimonials.disclaimer: Testimonials represent typical user experiences and may be paraphrased for clarity.

items.quote: Campus2Career connected me with an amazing internship opportunity at a Fortune 500 company. The experience was invaluable!
items.author: Sarah Chen

items.quote: The quality of talent we found through Campus2Career exceeded our expectations. These students brought fresh perspectives to our projects.
items.author: Michael Roberts

items.quote: As a first-generation college student, Campus2Career gave me access to opportunities I never knew existed.
items.author: James Williams

items.quote: We've hired three full-time employees from Campus2Career projects. It's become our primary talent pipeline.
items.author: Emily Thompson

items.quote: The platform made it easy to showcase my skills and connect with companies that value diversity and fresh thinking.
items.author: David Park

items.quote: Campus2Career's vetting process ensures we only work with the most motivated and talented students.
items.author: Lisa Anderson

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Join thousands of students and companies already using Campus2Career to create meaningful connections.
